mapper.insert: insert into t_board (board_seq, board_div, title, content, view_cnt, file_uuid, ins_seq, ins_dt, upt_seq, upt_dt, del_yn) values (#{boardSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{boardDiv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{viewCnt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fileUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{insDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{uptSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{uptDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_board set board_div = #{boardDiv,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, view_cnt = #{viewCnt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, file_uuid = #{fileUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ins_seq = #{insSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ins_dt = #{insDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, upt_seq = #{uptSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, upt_dt = #{uptDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_yn = #{delYn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where board_seq = #{boardSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select board_seq, board_div, title, content, view_cnt, file_uuid, ins_seq, ins_dt, upt_seq, upt_dt, del_yn from t_board where board_seq = #{boardSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}
